请先输入您的简历内容: Please enter your resume content first
请先输入您的职位描述: Please enter your job description first
优化简历需要花费几秒时间，请耐心等待: Optimizing your resume will take a few seconds, please wait patiently
ResumeOptimizer 是一款免费在线工具，旨在帮助求职者更有效地优化他:
ResumeOptimizer is a free online tool designed to help job seekers optimize their resumes more effectively to match target job requirements.
        With simple steps, you can quickly improve the quality of your resume and increase your chances of getting an interview.
复制粘贴您的简历内容到 ResumeOptimizer 的简历输入框。: Copy and paste your resume content into ResumeOptimizer's resume input box.
复制粘贴您感兴趣的职位要求到 ResumeOptimizer 的职位要求输入框。: Copy and paste the job requirements you are interested in into ResumeOptimizer's job requirements input box.
ResumeOptimizer 将分析您的简历和职位要求，并提供针对性的优化建议: ResumeOptimizer will analyze your resume and job requirements and provide targeted optimization suggestions.
根据 ResumeOptimizer 的建议，修改和完善您的简历。: Modify and improve your resume based on ResumeOptimizer's suggestions.
ResumeOptimizer 承诺不保留任何用户信息，保障您的隐私安全。: ResumeOptimizer promises not to retain any user information and to protect your privacy and security.
输入职位发布网址或粘贴完整描述: Enter job posting URL or paste full description
通过 URL 输入职位描述的功能即将推出: The ability to enter a job description via URL is coming soon
您的简历将不会被网站保存，绝不会与第三方共享: Your resume will not be saved by the website and will never be shared with third parties
文件上传功能即将推出: File upload feature is coming soon
